Description: All photos are of the actual item for sale. Used Item In excellent condition. There's a small scratch on treble side "side" beneath the control pots on the Mahogany; a small dent on the back of the neck around the 12th fret area. PRS McCarty 594 Artist Package Solidbody Electric Guitar w/ Case - River Blue with Pattern Vintage Neck Solidbody Electric Guitar with Artist-Grade Flame Maple top, Mahogany body, Flamed Maple neck with Brazilian Rosewood fingerboard and 2 Humbucking pickups. 7.5 lbs This PRS McCarty 594 Artist Package solidbody electric guitar features a delightful combination of a premium Mahogany body, artist-grade flame Maple top, and smooth-playing Brazilian Rosewood fingerboard. A versatile array of bell-like humbucking and single-coil tones are yours, by virtue of this guitar's 58/15 LT (low turn) pickups. Wait until you feel the exquisite playability of this McCarty 594 - its asymmetrical Pattern Vintage neck carve with 24.594" scale length ensures that you'll break a few speed records. And its 4-knob layout makes it easy to roll off both volume knobs simultaneously. This PRS McCarty 594 Artist Package blends vintage soul and modern playability into an exquisite solidbody electric guitar. Features New design from Paul Reed Smith Beautiful artist-grade Flamed Maple top Smooth-playing artist-grade Brazilian Rosewood fingerboard Longer 24.594" scale length offers a unique feel 58/15 LT (low turn) pickups deliver vintage humbucking and single-coil tones 4-knob layout allows individual control of each pickup's volume and tone Comfortable asymmetric Pattern Vintage neck carve Updated Phase III locking tuners transfer more energy to the headstock Technical Specs Body Type: Solidbody Body Shape: McCarty Doublecut Left-/Right-handed: Right-handed Number of Strings: 6 Body Material: Mahogany Top Material: Flame Maple Color: River Blue Neck Material: Select Mahogany Neck Shape: Pattern Vintage Fingerboard Material: Brazilian Rosewood Fingerboard Inlay: Green Ripple Outline/Green Abalone Center Artist Birds Number of Frets: 22 Scale Length: 24.594" Bridge/Tailpiece: PRS 2-Piece Stoptail bridge Tuners: PRS Phase III Locking Tuners Neck Pickup: 58/15 LT Bass Humbucker Bridge Pickup: 58/15 LT Treble Humbucker Controls: 2 x volume, 2 x tone (push/pull coil split), 3-way toggle switch Case Included: Gorgeous Black Paisley Hardshell case Includes Everything you see in the photo's Check out my other auction listings! and be sure to add me to your favorites list. CONTACT INFORMATION You can e-mail us with any questions you may have about an item. We are very easy to reach, and we are glad to help. Just click "Ask a question" in the questions and answers area below. Please note that we are not in the office after 5:00PM EST on weekdays, or all day Saturdays and Sundays. Questions asked over the weekend will be answered on the following business day. SHIPPING INFORMATION Items are shipped within one business day of payment. To avoid a lost or stolen item, your package may ship "Signature Required." If you have special shipping instructions or would like your item shipped UPS instead of USPS or FedEx, please contact us before you make a purchase. We collect local sales tax here in Indiana. This applies to Indiana residents who we ship to, as well as non-Indiana residents who drive here for local pickups. We also collect sales tax in other states around the country. Please check eBay's tax information on the "Shipping and payments" tab above to see if we are collecting tax in your area. PLEASE NOTE Shipping quotes are estimates only. We use eBay’s shipping calculator, which provides estimated shipping charges on listings where “Free Shipping” is not offered. Ebay's FedEx calculator on the item page quotes eBay's discounted FedEx shipping rates, which we honor. At checkout, however, buyers in certain areas will see the calculator attempt to charge the full retail price. FedEx's full retail price is the price you pay if you were to walk into a FedEx retail location. The difference between eBay's discounted rate and this retail price can be as much as 40%. If you estimate shipping with a zip code that is different from the zip code registered to your User ID, eBay’s shipping calculator will make the adjustment at checkout. Additionally, FedEx charges a surcharge for delivery in certain rural areas of the country that does not, for some reason, show up in eBay’s estimate calculator; but it does at checkout (we wish we could control this, but we can’t — we have contacted eBay many times about this issue). FedEx does this based on the +4 extension of your primary 5-digit zip code. For example, eBay’s shipping calculator may quote you one price based on your primary 5-digit zip, and then figure out that your requested street address at checkout places you within the rural surcharge area, changing the shipping price to an alternate amount that was originally quoted. If there is a discrepancy in your shipping cost, please send us a screen shot of the quoted price to you on our item page and we can override the eBay checkout calculation to get you the cheapest rate. RETURN INFORMATION We want you to be completely happy with your purchase. If the item you receive is not as described or has been damaged in shipping, please contact us immediately. We will make every effort to promptly resolve any problem. Your satisfaction is our top priority. We are happy to offer free shipping on some of the items we offer. Please note that if you decide to return something where free shipping was offered, our shipping costs are non-refundable.
